mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( productNum , productName, brand , content, price, viewCount, regdate, saveFileName, fileSize) VALUES ( product_seq.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{brand}, #{content}, #{price}, #{viewCount}, SYSDATE, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize} )
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT productNum,productName,brand,content,price,, saveFileName, LAG(productNum, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY productNum DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(productNum, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY productNum DESC) AS nextNum FROM product ORDER BY productNum DESC) result1 WHERE productNum=#{num}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT productNum,productName,brand,content,price,viewCount,, saveFileName,fileSize FROM product
OR productName LIKE '%'||#{productName}||'%'
OR brand LIKE '%'||#{brand}||'%'
ORDER BY productNum DESC ) result1 ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM product
OR productName LIKE '%'||#{productName}||'%'
OR brand LIKE '%'||#{brand}||'%'
select * from product p1 where 3 > (select count(viewCount) from product p2 where p2.viewCount > p1.viewCount) order by viewCount desc
